titleStmt.title: The present state of the islands in the archipelago, or Arches, seas of Constantinople and gulph [sic] of Smyrna with the islands of Candia and Rhodes / faithfully describ'd by Ber. Randolph : to which is annexed an index shewing the longitude and latitude of all the places in the new map of Greece lately published by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Randolph, Bernard, b. 1643.

titleStmt.title: The present state of the islands in the archipelago, or Arches, seas of Constantinople and gulph [sic] of Smyrna with the islands of Candia and Rhodes / faithfully describ'd by Ber. Randolph : to which is annexed an index shewing the longitude and latitude of all the places in the new map of Greece lately published by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Randolph, Bernard, b. 1643.

notesStmt.note: "A relation of a storm and great deliverance at sea in a voyage from New England": p. 98-108.
This item is also bound following "The present state of Morea" (Wing R238) at reel 820:41.
Imperfect: First 26 pages lacking on film.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
